title: My club
body: My club is alive and well, except i'm not in it. I'm the leader of it but it doesn't show me at all. my friends who I invited still have the tag, but I do not. They even show me in it.

replies.body: Anyone from riot care to comment?

We're aware of some lingering Clubs issues still going on. We can assist you in resolving this if you reach out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
